revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: Ratio sacra or an appeal unto the rational world, about the reasonableness of revealed religion: containing a rational as well as scriptural confutation of the three..."
revision.text: Possibly: Ratio sacra or an appeal unto the rational world, about the reasonableness of revealed religion: containing a rational as well as scriptural confutation of the three grand prevailing errours of the present day, to wit, atheism, deism, and Bourignonism ... [By Thomas Blackwell]. (Edinburgh : Printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson [i.e. James Anderson], 1710). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/629923453
